tool.name: Convert a 10X BAM file to FASTQ
tool.command: bamtofastq --nthreads "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}" --reads-per-fastq 10000000000 #if $convert.reads == 'subset': --locus $convert.locus #end if $produced_from $tenx_bam outdir && mv outdir/*/*.fastq.gz outdir

param.name: tenx_bam
param.label: 10X Genomics BAM file to convert to FASTQ

param.name: reads
param.label: Read pairs to convert?
param.option: Only a subset of BAM file

param.name: locus
param.label: Only include read pairs mapping to a locus.
param.help: The format is chr:start-end, for example "chr1:14300-125000".

param.name: sort
param.label: Skip unpaired or duplicated reads instead of throwing an error?

param.name: produced_from
param.label: BAM file produced from
param.option: Long Ranger v2.1+ and Cell Ranger v1.2+

citations.citation: @misc{github10xbamtofastq, author = {}, year = {2022}, title = {10x bamtofastq}, publisher = {Github}, journal = {Github repository}, url = {https://github.com/10XGenomics/bamtofastq}, }
